languages.text: {n}Тьма немилостива. Вы выучили это, пытаясь укрыться от терзающих вас {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}кошмаров{/d}, жмурясь что есть мочи посреди бессонных ночей, не находя покоя ни во сне, ни наяву. Стоит лечь последнему стежку, как вы чувствуете — ужасы уже тут, стерегут вас, вожделенно ждут, когда вы оступитесь. И тогда вы захлебнетесь в немилостивой тьме.{/n}

{n}Darkness is merciless. You learned this while trying to hide from the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}nightmares{/d} that torment you. No matter how tightly you shut your eyes on those long nights, the haunting visions would not leave you alone, either in sleep or during waking hours. The moment Kibellah applies the final stitch, you can feel it: the horrors are already here, lying in wait for you to make even a single misstep. And when you do, they will drown you in that merciless darkness.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тьма немилостива. Вы выучили это, пытаясь укрыться от терзающих вас {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}кошмаров{/d}, жмурясь что есть мочи посреди бессонных ночей, не находя покоя ни во сне, ни наяву. Стоит лечь последнему стежку, как вы чувствуете — ужасы уже тут, стерегут вас, вожделенно ждут, когда вы оступитесь. И тогда вы захлебнетесь в немилостивой тьме.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Darkness is merciless. You learned this by trying to hide from the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}nightmares{/d} that torment you. No matter how tightly you shut your eyes on your long nights, the haunting visions would not leave, either in sleep or in hours of waking. As soon as Kibellah applies the last stitch, you can feel it: the horrors are already here, lying in wait until you make a single misstep. And when you do, they will drown you in the merciless darkness.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dunkelheit ist gnadenlos. Das hast du gelernt, als du dich vor den {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}Albträumen{/d} verstecken wolltest, die dich quälen. Egal, wie fest du die Augen in jenen langen Nächten geschlossen hast, die quälenden Visionen folgten dir im Schlaf ebenso wie in deinen wachen Stunden. Als Kibellah den letzten Stich vornimmt, spürst du es. Die Schrecken sind bereits hier und warten auf einen einzigen Fehltritt von dir. Und sobald du ihn machst, zerren sie dich in diese gnadenlose Dunkelheit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Darkness is merciless. You learned this while trying to hide from the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}nightmares{/d} that torment you. And when you do, they will drown you in that merciless darkness.{/n}

Egal, wie fest du die Augen in jenen langen Nächten geschlossen hast, die quälenden Visionen folgten dir im Schlaf ebenso wie in deinen wachen Stunden. Als Kibellah den letzten Stich vornimmt, spürst du es. Die Schrecken sind bereits hier und warten auf einen einzigen Fehltritt von dir. Und sobald du ihn machst, zerren sie dich in diese gnadenlose Dunkelheit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les ténèbres sont sans pitié. Vous l'avez appris à vos dépens en cherchant à échapper aux {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}cauchemars{/d} qui vous tourmentent en permanence. Vous avez beau fermer les yeux de toutes vos forces, ces longues nuits sont peuplées de visions qui vous hantent sans relâche, peu importe que vous dormiez ou que vous restiez {mf|éveillé|éveillée}. À peine Kibellah a-t-elle posé le dernier point de suture que vous les sentez : les horreurs sont déjà là, tapies dans l'ombre, guettant avidement votre moindre faux pas. Au premier écart, elles vous noieront dans leur noirceur implacable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Darkness is merciless. You learned this while trying to hide from the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}nightmares{/d} that torment you. No matter how tightly you shut your eyes on those long nights, the haunting visions would not leave you alone, either in sleep or during waking hours. The moment Kibellah applies the final stitch, you can feel it: the horrors are already here, lying in wait for you to make even a single misstep. And when you do, they will drown you in that merciless darkness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les ténèbres sont sans pitié. Vous l'avez appris à vos dépens en cherchant à échapper aux {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}cauchemars{/d} qui vous tourmentent en permanence. Vous avez beau fermer les yeux de toutes vos forces, ces longues nuits sont peuplées de visions qui vous hantent sans relâche, peu importe que vous dormiez ou que vous restiez {mf|éveillé|éveillée}. À peine Kibellah a-t-elle posé le dernier point de suture que vous les sentez : les horreurs sont déjà là, tapies dans l'ombre, guettant avidement votre moindre faux pas. Au premier écart, elles vous noieront dans leur noirceur implacable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La oscuridad es despiadada. Descubriste esto al intentar esconderte de las {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}pesadillas{/d} que te atormentan. Da igual con cuánta fuerza cierres los ojos en esas largas noches, porque las espantosas visiones no dan tregua, ni en sueños ni mientras estás despiert{mf|o|a}. En cuanto Kibellah aplica la última sutura, puedes sentirlo: los horrores ya están aquí, esperando a que cometas el más mínimo error. Y cuando lo hagas, te ahogarán con esa inmisericorde oscuridad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Darkness is merciless. You learned this while trying to hide from the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}nightmares{/d} that torment you. No matter how tightly you shut your eyes on those long nights, the haunting visions would not leave you alone, either in sleep or during waking hours. The moment Kibellah applies the final stitch, you can feel it: the horrors are already here, lying in wait for you to make even a single misstep. And when you do, they will drown you in that merciless darkness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La oscuridad es despiadada. Descubriste esto al intentar esconderte de las {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}pesadillas{/d} que te atormentan. Da igual con cuánta fuerza cierres los ojos en esas largas noches, porque las espantosas visiones no dan tregua, ni en sueños ni mientras estás despiert{mf|o|a}. En cuanto Kibellah aplica la última sutura, puedes sentirlo: los horrores ya están aquí, esperando a que cometas el más mínimo error. Y cuando lo hagas, te ahogarán con esa inmisericorde oscuridad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}闇は無慈悲だ。あなたは自身を苦しめる{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}悪夢{/d}から逃れようとする中でこのことを学んだ。長い夜の中で、どれだけ強く目を閉ざそうとも、恐ろしい幻覚は寝ても覚めてもあなたを放っておいてはくれなかった。キベラが最後の縫い目を閉じた瞬間、それを感じた。恐怖は既にここに存在し、あなたが迂闊な一歩を踏み出すのを待ち構えている。たった一歩のミスで、あなたは無慈悲な闇に溺れさせられるだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Darkness is merciless. You learned this while trying to hide from the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}nightmares{/d} that torment you. No matter how tightly you shut your eyes on those long nights, the haunting visions would not leave you alone, either in sleep or during waking hours. The moment Kibellah applies the final stitch, you can feel it: the horrors are already here, lying in wait for you to make even a single misstep. And when you do, they will drown you in that merciless darkness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}闇は無慈悲だ。あなたは自身を苦しめる{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}悪夢{/d}から逃れようとする中でこのことを学んだ。長い夜の中で、どれだけ強く目を閉ざそうとも、恐ろしい幻覚は寝ても覚めてもあなたを放っておいてはくれなかった。キベラが最後の縫い目を閉じた瞬間、それを感じた。恐怖は既にここに存在し、あなたが迂闊な一歩を踏み出すのを待ち構えている。たった一歩のミスで、あなたは無慈悲な闇に溺れさせられるだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}黑暗是无情的。很久以前，当你试着避开那些折磨你的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}噩梦{/d}时，你就意识到了这一点。在那些漫长的夜晚之中，无论你将双眼闭得多紧，无论是在梦里还是在清醒的时候，那些幻象都会缠着你，不肯放你离开。当绮贝菈缝完了最后一针时，你感觉到恐怖已然降临，它们就在这里等着你。只要你犯了错误，哪怕是最微不足道的失误，无情的黑暗便会立刻将你吞没。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Darkness is merciless. You learned this while trying to hide from the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}nightmares{/d} that torment you. No matter how tightly you shut your eyes on those long nights, the haunting visions would not leave you alone, either in sleep or during waking hours. The moment Kibellah applies the final stitch, you can feel it: the horrors are already here, lying in wait for you to make even a single misstep. And when you do, they will drown you in that merciless darkness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}黑暗是无情的。很久以前，当你试着避开那些折磨你的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}噩梦{/d}时，你就意识到了这一点。在那些漫长的夜晚之中，无论你将双眼闭得多紧，无论是在梦里还是在清醒的时候，那些幻象都会缠着你，不肯放你离开。当绮贝菈缝完了最后一针时，你感觉到恐怖已然降临，它们就在这里等着你。只要你犯了错误，哪怕是最微不足道的失误，无情的黑暗便会立刻将你吞没。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Karanlık merhamet bilmez. Bunu sana eziyet eden {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}kâbuslardan{/d} saklanmaya çalışırken öğrenmiştin. O uzun gecelerde gözlerini ne kadar sıkı kapatırsan kapat, musallat olan görüler ne uykunda ne de uyanıkken seni yalnız bırakırdı. Kibellah'nın son dikişi attığı an bunu hissetmeye başladın. Dehşetler, hâlihazırda yanı başında. En ufak bir yanlışını görmek için pusuda bekliyorlar. Bu yanlışı yaptığında seni merhamet bilmeyen bir karanlıkta boğacaklar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Darkness is merciless. You learned this while trying to hide from the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}nightmares{/d} that torment you. No matter how tightly you shut your eyes on those long nights, the haunting visions would not leave you alone, either in sleep or during waking hours. The moment Kibellah applies the final stitch, you can feel it: the horrors are already here, lying in wait for you to make even a single misstep. And when you do, they will drown you in that merciless darkness.{/n}
